citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 2:00-2:30 pm
on 09/29/2014.
I rang the door bell, honked my car horn, and left message on answering machine.
